snippet: India accused the American Embassy in New Delhi of selling duty-free items to nondiplomats, which it said was a violation of the law.
abstract: India asks American Embassy in New Delhi to stop selling liquor and other duty-free goods to nondiplomats, acting before the American authorities are to decide whether to prosecute Indian diplomat, Devyani Khobragade, in New York who was arrested in a visa fraud case.
lead_paragraph: India accused the American Embassy in New Delhi of selling duty-free items to nondiplomats, which it said was a violation of the law.

headline.main: India and U.S. Continue Fight Over Diplomacy
headline.print_headline: India and U.S. Continue Fight Over Diplomacy
